summary: A dark secret hidden surrounds a mysterious girl who is an outcast the entire village alienates and a boy who tries to get close to her who has a tragedy of his in his past. As romance blossoms so do rumours.
cast: Shi-hoo Kim|Yun-hea Kim|Chang-gil Moon|So-dam Park|Oh Hee-Joon|Kim Kwang-sub|Tae-hee Lee|Jin-woo Park|Jang In-sub|Hyun-woo Seo|Hee-Jung Han|Jo Han-Chul|In-gi Jeong|Doo-Gyum Jung|Ju Bong Ki|Yoon Kyung-Ho|Jang-You Lee|Kim Yoon-hye
title: Sonyeo
